At first when I bought this game, I hated getting killed and I hated seeing that I did like 10 damage with an AR. But when I started to know how to shoot properly, I fell in love with this game. It takes time to learn and thats what I love about it. Overall great game. I'd give it an 8.5/10 in my book.
